_comment: This is an example configuration file for the MCP launcher
_comment2: Copy this file to launcher_config.json and modify as needed
_comment3: List of directories to search for MCP tools. Each directory should contain a Python file that exports server, app, and sse_transport objects.

portAllocation._comment4: Port allocation mode: 'auto' for automatic assignment, 'manual' for specific port assignments
portAllocation._comment5: Starting port for auto allocation (only used in auto mode)

ports._comment7: Manual port assignments (only used in manual mode)

server._comment8: Host address for all servers. Use '127.0.0.1' for localhost only
server._comment9: Log level for Uvicorn servers: debug, info, warning, error, critical

logging._comment10: Log level for the launcher itself
logging._comment12: Path to log file, or null for console-only logging

errorHandling._comment13: Continue with other tools if one fails
errorHandling._comment14: Stop immediately on first error (overrides continueOnError)

_comment16: All configuration values can be overridden with environment variables:
_comment17: LAUNCHER_TOOL_DIRECTORIES - Comma-separated list of tool directories
_comment19: LAUNCHER_BASE_PORT - Base port for auto allocation
